attributes.action: What the majority of people want, but parliament dosent listen.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We the undersigned would like the government to reinstate capital punishment, for heinous crimes against vulnerable people, the vast majority of the people are in favour of this, yet, time and again, our politicians, (who are supposed to do the will of the people) vote against it. Politicians should listen to the people, not the other way round.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
